nodes.bodyText: I might be wrong. It seems the SQL_TOKEN usually implies null ordDir and ordNul. Also, you might need to update the comment as well.

so the above comment only applies in HQL. Now we allow for another possibility that "printing to the SQL output directly". We need to add more explanation to the comment above, for it is not accurate any more.
